author: wnf

comments.content: I’m continually impressed with how well FF DIN performs at small sizes on screen. The square shape really works with the pixel grid. It looks like there are some subpixel rendering (Cleartype?) problems in that black text, though.
Thanks to both of you... yet again! :-)
